name: exits-saas-lms-monorepo
description: ExITS SaaS LMS - Monorepo with API, Web, Mobile, and Shared Libraries

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "API,WEB,MOBILE" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgMagenta" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.install:all: cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../loanflow && npm install
